Where there is abundance there is overflow

Community, connection and purpose never run dry at Bethany Christian Care. Because when youâ€™re surrounded by friends, family and neighbours, youâ€™ll always find more to enjoy.

For more than 70 years we have been the leaders in quality, Christian care for seniors.

Our three locations across south-east Queensland provide loving communities where our residents are connected and cared for, whether they have few care needs, or need higher care or secure care for people living with dementia.

Our locations

We create beautiful environments for our residents that cover the full spectrum of seniors' accommodation and care needs.

The Plains

The Plains

Independent living | Serviced apartments | Residential aged care | Secure dementia care

Located in the heart of Brisbane's south at Eight Mile Plains, The Plains is known for its beautiful, home-like environment.

Learn more
Janoah Gardens

Janoah Gardens

Independent living | Serviced apartments | Residential aged care

Enjoy fresh sea breezes and bayside living at Janoah Gardens in Manly. Be part of loving, close-knit community.

Learn more
Beth Eden

Beth Eden

Independent living | Residential aged care | Secure dementia care

Be part of a large, warm family at Beth Eden, a lush and leafy location on the banks of the river at Graceville.

Learn more

Work with us

You can turn your career into your calling at Bethany Christian Care.

If you have a call on your life to serve older Australians, we want to hear from you. We will support you, give you opportunities to grow, and celebrate with you as you enable our residents to live abundantly.

Learn more
